value./test-tools-7zip/batches/tools-7zip-basi:
tools/7zip/add --archive test-basic.7z --files apps/test-tools-7zip/data/test.txt
tools/7zip/list --archive test-basic.7z
tools/7zip/test --archive test-basic.7z
tools/7zip/extract --archive test-basic.7z --output apps/test-tools-7zip/data/extracted/
tools/7zip/add --archive test-zip.zip --files apps/test-tools-7zip/data/test.txt --type zip
tools/7zip/list --archive test-zip.zip
tools/7zip/extract-flat --archive test-zip.zip --output apps/test-tools-7zip/data/extracted-flat/
value./test-tools-7zip/batches/tools-7zip-clea:
tools/7zip/add --archive test-clean.7z --files apps/test-tools-7zip/data/test.txt
tools/7zip/list --archive test-clean.7z
tools/7zip/test --archive test-clean.7z
tools/7zip/extract --archive test-clean.7z --output apps/test-tools-7zip/data/clean-extracted/ --overwrite
tools/7zip/add --archive test-clean.zip --files apps/test-tools-7zip/data/test.txt --type zip
tools/7zip/list --archive test-clean.zip
tools/7zip/extract-flat --archive test-clean.zip --output apps/test-tools-7zip/data/clean-extracted-flat/ --overwrite
value./test-tools-7zip/batches/tools-7zip-help:
tools/7zip/add --help
tools/7zip/add -h
tools/7zip/extract --help  
tools/7zip/extract -h
tools/7zip/extract-flat --help
tools/7zip/extract-flat -h
tools/7zip/list --help
tools/7zip/list -h
tools/7zip/test --help
tools/7zip/test -h
tools/7zip/update --help
tools/7zip/update -h
tools/7zip/delete --help
tools/7zip/delete -h
